calendar-event-select-committee.subject: London's population and the 2011 Census
calendar-event-select-committee.witness: Glen Watson, Census Director, Guy Goodwin, Director of Population, Health and Regional Analysis, Office for National Statistics, and Barry Quirk, Census Regional Champion for London
